version_description:
1. Fix some bugs.
2. In live view page, add new function "Crop" (for the device supports this)

1. Supports Reolink Keen
2. Updates the UI of Local Settings
3. Updates the UI of Device Settings
4. Adds a new page on battery stats
5. Fix some bugs.

1. Supports Reolink Argus
2. Fixes the login failure issue under IPv6 protocol
3. Fixes some bugs

1. Supports Reolink Argus
2. Fixes the login failure issue under IPv6 protocol
3. Fixes some bugs

1. Adds rapid configuration for PIR motion sensor.
2. Supports hands-free mode for two-way audio.
3. Adds “Share Device” function.
4. Fixes some bugs.

1.Adds “Display” advanced configuration.
2.Adds schedule recording function.
3.Adds unlock-screen function for video preview and playback.
4.Improves the prompt and display of rights management.
5.Supports German and Turkish.

1. Adds undervoltage detection and notification for battery powered security cameras.
2. Adds “help” page for battery powered security cameras.
3. Adds prompt to lower the video streaming when in bad Internet connection.
4. Fixes some other bug.

1. Adds the function of turning on/off status LEDs (for Reolink Argus, Keen, C1 & C2).
2. Changes the icon interface into flat style.
3. Displays 2 time axes in video playback interface.
4. Supports downloading up to 30-second videos when replaying videos.

1. Changes the icon interface into flat style.
2. Displays 2 time axes in video playback interface.
3. Supports downloading up to 30-second videos when replaying videos.

1. Changes the interface of “Device List”.
2. Changes the interface of “Device Settings”.
3. Adds the sidebar. The app settings are now available in the sidebar.
4. Fixes other bugs.

1. Changes the preview interface, and optimizes the user experience of the video preview.
2. Fixes some other bugs.

1. Change interface of playback.
2. Fix some bugs.

1. Updates the user interface of video playback.
2. Fixes some other bugs.

1. Optimizes setup interface and enriches the contents.
2. Fixes some other bugs and improves the app’s stability.

1. Releases a new scene mode feature, which allows you to control security camera alarms for different situations, like at home, at work or on vacations, etc., with a single tap.
2. Synchronizes the time of your devices with your smartphones for DST changes.
3. Adds a new Adjust Device Order feature, which allows you to move your favorite devices to the top in app settings.
4. Optimizes some other features.

1. Adds a new language, Finnish, to the app.
2. Fixes some bugs.

1. Features an immersive preview mode: swipe left to enjoy better surveillance experience with greater view and less distractions.
2. Allows you to share videos to #ReolinkCaptures over app and win special gifts.
3. Releases a new channel to add devices, which allows you to scan devices within LAN easily without entering UID.
4. Fixes some other bugs.

1. Features an immersive preview mode: swipe left to enjoy better surveillance experience with greater view and less distractions.
2. Allows you to share videos to #ReolinkCaptures over app and win special gifts.
3. Releases a new channel to add devices, which allows you to scan devices within LAN easily without entering UID.
4. Fixes some other bugs.

1. Adds a Speeded-Up Playback feature, which allows you to speed up one-day moments stored on Reolink Cloud and makes it easy to replay all videos automatically. Note that it is only available for Standard Plan, Premier Plan and Business Plan subscribers by now.
2. Optimizes user experience of some features.
3. Fixes some other bugs.

1. Adds a Speeded-Up Playback feature, which allows you to speed up one-day moments stored on Reolink Cloud and makes it easy to replay all videos automatically. Note that it is only available for Standard Plan, Premier Plan and Business Plan subscribers by now.
2. Optimizes user experience of some features.
3. Fixes some other bugs.

1. Adds the Privacy Mask feature, which allows you to cover certain areas on Display interface to better protect your privacy.
2. Optimizes user experience of some features.
3. Makes the Google Home support available in all countries now, which allows you to control cameras with simple voice commands. You can find the feature and enable the supported cameras on the Cloud > Smart Home interface.

1. Optimizes user experience of some features.
2. Fixes some bugs.

1. Optimizes user experience of some features.
2. Simplifies product registration procedure.
3. Fixes some other bugs.

1. Optimizes device settings, including email notification, motion detection sensitivity and some other settings.
2. Improves user experience of some other pages.
3. Fixes some other bugs.

1. Releases dark mode, which allows you to enjoy comfort of use at night. Users may turn on dark mode manually or set up auto-switch based on phone settings on the side menu (the latter option is available for iOS 13 and above only).
2. Improves user experience of some features.
3. Polishes French, Spanish, Japanese, and Portuguese translation in the app.
4. Fixes some other bugs.

1. Releases dark mode, which allows you to enjoy comfort of use at night. Users may turn on dark mode manually or set up auto-switch based on phone settings on the side menu (the latter option is available for iOS 13 and above only).
2. Improves user experience of some features.
3. Polishes French, Spanish, Japanese, and Portuguese translation in the app.
4. Fixes some other bugs.

1. Introduces the latest IP cameras with smart person/vehicle detection, RLC-510A and RLC-810A, and adds some exciting features for these cameras to the app, which includes:
- Smart detection, delivering more accurate push notifications of person, vehicle, or other motion detection and differentiating video footage on the basis of person, vehicle, or other motion detection.
- Customizable smart alerts, allowing users to set up and receive alerts about what they truly care about and reducing false alarms.
- Time lapse feature, enabling users to capture long-term events into short videos or photo albums.
Please note that the features above are only available for the new smart detection IP camera lineup (RLC-XXXA) at present.
2. Improves performance of some features.
3. Fixes some other bugs.

1.Introduces Reolink Drive, a local storage device, and adds setting options for Reolink Drive.
2.Fixes some bugs.
